maqras.text: Watashi wa, shizunde yuku hoshi ni kakete chikau
Sore wa hontoni idaina chikaidearu. Moshi anata gata ni wakarunaraba
hontoni kore wa, hijo ni totoi kuruandearu
(Soreha) hizo no keiten no naka ni (kaka rete ari)
kiyome rareta mono no soto, fureru koto ga dekinai
Ban'yu no nushi kara no keijidearu
Kore wa, anata gata ga karonjiru yona oshiedearou ka
Mata anata gata wa (sore o) kyogidearu to moshitate, anata gata no kurashi o tateru no ka
Sorenara anata gata wa,(rinju no hito no tamashi ga) nodo moto o fusagu toki
(suwatte tada) mimamoru bakarina no ka
Ware wa anata ga tayori mo kare ni chikai nodearu. Daga anata gata ni wa mie wa shinai
Anata gataga moshi (raise no) mukui o jogai sa rete iru to iu nonara, anata gata wa naze
sono (tamashi) o (tainai ni) yobimodosanai no ka. Moshi anata gataga, shinjitsu (o katatte iru no)naraba
Moshi kare ga,(arra) ni chikadzuke rareta monodearunara
(kare ni taisuru hosho wa) anshin to man'etsu, soshite shifuku no rakuendearu
Moshi kare ga, migite no nakamadearunaraba
anata ni heian'are.' To migite no nakama kara (aisatsu sa reru)
Mo shikare ga, uso-tsuki de, mayotta monodearunaraba
nietatsu yu no taigu o uke
goku hi de yaka reyou
Hontoni kore wa, yurugi no nai tashikana shinridearu
Dakara idaide ara reru anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arra o tataeru. Hontoni kare wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
Ten to ji no taiken wa, kare no yudearu. Kare wa nama o sazuke, mata shi o sazukeru. Kare wa subete ni tsuite zen'no de ara reru
Kare wa saisho no kata de, mata saigo no kata de,-gai ni arawareru katadeari mata uchi Takumi nasa reru katadearu. Kare wa subete no jibutsu o jukuchi nasa reru

Kare koso wa tenchi o 6-nichi no ma ni sozo nasa re, sorekara gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru katadearu. Kare wa ji ni hairu mono, soko kara deru mono, mata ten kara kudaru mono, soko ni noboru mono o shiri tsukusa reru. Anata gataga doko ni iyoutomo, kare wa anata gata to tomoni ara reru. Arra wa anata gata no okonau subete no koto o gozonji de ara reru
Ten to ji no taiken wa, kare no yudearu. (Issai no) jibutsu wa, arra no omoto ni kisa reru
Kare wa yoru o hiru no naka ni botsunyu sa se, mata hiru o yoru no naka ni botsunyu nasa reru. Mata mune ni himeru koto o jukuchi nasa reru

Arra to sono shito o shinji, kare ga anata gata ni tsuga se rareta mono no naka kara,(-nushi no michi no tame ni) hodokoshi nasai. Anata gata no naka de shinko shite (zaisan ya gino ya roryoku o) shiyo suru mono, kare-ra ni wa idaina hosho ga arou

Don'na wake de anata gata wa, arra o shinko shinai no ka. Shito wa, anata gata no omo o shinko suru yo yobikakete iru. Moshi anata gataga shinjanara, kare wa sudeni anata gata no seiyaku o ukeire rareta nodearu
Kare koso wa, anata gata o ankoku kara komyo ni tsuredasu tame ni, sono shimo be ni meiryona shirushi o kudasa reta katadearu. Arra wa, anata gata ni shinsetsude jihibukaku ara reru

Don'na wake de anata gata wa, arra no michi no tame hodokosanai no ka. Hontoni tenchi no isan no sozoku wa, arra ni zokusuru. Anata gata no naka, shori no mae ni (zai o) hodokoshi sento suru mono to,-go kara so suru mono to onajide wanai. Korera no mono wa,(shori no)-go ni hodokoshite sento suru mono yori mo koidearu. Daga arra wa, subete no mono ni zen (ki hosho) o yakusoku sa reta. Hontoni arra wa, anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
Arra ni yoi kashi o, kashi tsukeru mono wa dare ka. Kare wa sore o bai ni sa re,(sono soto ni) kimaenoyoi hosho o sazukerudearou

Sonohi anata wa, shinja no otoko to shinja no on'na no, mae no kata ya migigawa ni, kare-ra no hikari ga hashiru no o mirudearou. (Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Kyo wa, anata gata e no kippo ga aru. Kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen no kotodearu. Eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu. Sore koso wa, hontoni idaina kofuku no jojudearu

Sonohi, nise shinja no danjo wa, shinja ni iudearou. `Watashi-tachi o matte kure, anata gatakara hikari o karitai.'(Daga kare-ra ni wa) iwa reyou. `Ushiro ni hikikaese, soshite hikari o motome nasai.' Sokode kare-ra no ma ni kabe ga moke rareru. Soko ni hitotsu no mon ga aru ga, sono uchigawa ni wa jihi ga, sono sotogawa ni wa chobatsu ga aru

Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gata to isshode wanai ka.' To sakebudearou. Kare-ra (shinja) wa iudearou. `Soda,daga anata gata wa jibun no yuwaku ni makase,(watashi-tachi no botsuraku o) machinozomi,(-nushi no yakusoku ni) utagai o daki, munashi nozomi ni azamuka rete iru uchi ni, arra no meirei ga yattekuru ni itatta. Gimansha ga, arra ni tsuite anata gata o azamuita nodearu

Kyo to natte wa, anata gata no minoshirokin wa ukeire rarenaidearou. Mata (Akira-ra-samana) fushin-sha-tachi wa naonokoto. Anata gata no sumai wa jigoku no gokadearu. Sore wa anata gata no tomoda. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo
